# Architecture Decision Records

This directory contains Architecture Decision Records (ADRs) for significant technical decisions in
this project.

## Index

| ADR                                     | Title                             | Status   |
| --------------------------------------- | --------------------------------- | -------- |
| [0001](./0001-use-amp-for-portfolio.md) | Use AMP for Portfolio Site        | Accepted |
| [0002](./0002-eleventy-as-ssg.md)       | Eleventy as Static Site Generator | Accepted |

## Creating a New ADR

1. Copy `TEMPLATE.md` to `NNNN-title-of-decision.md`
2. Fill in the sections
3. Update this README index
4. Submit via PR for review

## References

- [ADR GitHub Organization](https://adr.github.io/)
- [Michael Nygard's Article](https://cognitect.com/blog/2011/11/15/documenting-architecture-decisions)
